ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: GACS-24 Total of all items
Notes: Total [gacs24_1] to [gacs24_24]

ElementDescription: GACS-24 Average of Sum
Notes: Average of Sum [gacs24_1] to [gacs24_24]

ElementDescription: Creativity: When a person uses creativity, they see, do, and/or create things that are useful; they think of unique ways to solve problems and be productive. How often do you use Creativity?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Curiosity: When a person uses curiosity, they are interested in new activities, ideas, and people; they are open to new experiences. How often do you use Curiosity?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Judgment/Critical Thinking: When a person uses Judgment/Critical Thinking, they examine things from all sides; they do not jump to conclusions, but instead attempt to weigh all the evidence when making decisions. How often do you use Judgment/Critical Thinking?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Love of Learning: When a person uses Love of Learning, they often find ways to deepen their knowledge and experiences; they regularly look for new opportunities to learn; they are passionate about building knowledge. How often do you use Love of Learning?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Perspective/Wisdom: When a person uses Perspective/Wisdom, they look at the "big picture" view of things; they help others make sense of the world; they learn from their mistakes. How often do you use Perspective/Wisdom?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Bravery/Courage: When a person uses Bravery/Courage, they face their fears and overcome challenges; they stand up for what is right; they do not back down from physical or emotional tension or pain. How often do you use Bravery/Courage?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Perseverance: When a person uses Perseverance, they keep going and going when they have a goal in mind; they attempt to overcome all obstacles; they finish what they start. How often do you use Perseverance?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Honesty: When a person uses Honesty, they are a person of high integrity and authenticity; they tell the truth, even when it hurts; they present themselves to others in a sincere way; they take responsibility for their actions. How often do you use Honesty?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Zest: When a person uses Zest, they are enthusiastic toward life; they are highly energetic and activated; they use their energy to the fullest degree. How often do you use Zest?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Love: When a person uses Love, they are warm and genuine to others; they not only share but are open to receiving love from others; they value growing close and intimate with others. How often do you use Love?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Kindness: When a person uses Kindness, they do good things for people; they help and care for others; they are generous and giving; they are compassionate. How often do you use Kindness?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Social Intelligence: When a person uses Social Intelligence, they pay close attention to the emotions and thoughts of others; they seem to know what to say and do in any social situation. How often do you use Social Intelligence?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Teamwork: When a person uses Teamwork, they are a collaborative and participative member on groups and teams; they are loyal to their group; they feel a strong sense of duty to their group; they always do their share. How often do you use Teamwork?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Fairness: When a person uses Fairness, they believe strongly in an equal and fair opportunity for all; they don't let personal feelings bias their decisions about others; they treat people the way they want to be treated. How often do you use Fairness?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Leadership: When a person uses Leadership, they positively influence those they lead; they prefer to lead than to follow; they are very good at organizing and taking charge for the collective benefit of the group. How often do you use Leadership?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Forgiveness/Mercy: When a person uses Forgiveness/Mercy, they readily let go of hurt after they are wronged; they give people a second chance; they are not vengeful or resentful; they accept people's shortcomings (faults). How often do you use Forgiveness/Mercy?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Humility/Modesty: When a person uses Humility/Modesty, they let their accomplishments speak for themselves; they see their own goodness but prefer to focus the attention on others; they do not see themselves as more special than others; they admit their imperfections. How often do you use Humility/Modesty?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Prudence: When a person uses Prudence, they are wisely cautious; they plan and are conscientious; they are careful to not take unnecessary risks or do things they might later regret. How often do you use Prudence?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Self-Regulation: When a person uses Self-Regulation, they are very disciplined, they manage their bad habits; they stay calm and cool under pressure; they manage their impulses and emotions. How often do you use Self-Regulation?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Appreciation of Beauty & Excellence: When a person uses Appreciation of Beauty & Excellence, they notice the beauty and excellence around them; they are often amazed by beauty, greatness, and/or the goodness they see; they are often filled with wonder. How often do you use Appreciation of Beauty & Excellence?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Gratitude: When a person uses Gratitude, they regularly experience and express thankfulness; they don't take good things that happen in their life for granted; they tend to feel grateful in many circumstances. How often do you use Gratitude?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Hope: When a person uses Hope, they are optimistic, expecting the best to happen; they believe in and work toward a positive future; they can think of many pathways to reach their goals. How often do you use Hope?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Humor: When a person uses Humor, they are playful; they love to make people smile and laugh; their sense of humor helps them connect closely to others; they make bad or boring situations more fun with jokes. How often do you use Humor?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: Sense of Meaning: When a person uses Sense of Meaning, they hold a set of beliefs, whether religious or not, about how their life is part of something bigger and more meaningful; those beliefs shape their behavior and provide a sense of comfort, understanding, and purpose. How often do you use Sense of Meaning?
Notes: 1 = Never ; 2 = Seldom ; 3 = Sometimes ; 4 = Often ; 5 = Almost Always

ElementDescription: mGACS-24 Total of all items
Notes: Total [gacs_creativity] to [gacs_spiritual]

ElementDescription: mGACS-24 Average of Sum
Notes: Average of Sum [gacs_creativity] to [gacs_spiritual]
